    • getAnnotationQuery

      public String getAnnotationQuery(long id)
      Search for both UGC docs with given IDDOC and with MD_ANNOTATION_ID = "annotation_". Searching for IDDOC is only included for backwards compatibility purposes. The correct identifier is MD_ANNOTATION_ID since it reflects the original sql identifier
      Parameters:
      id -
      Returns:
      Generated query
